location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Coll 29/88 'Conditions of life at the consular posts at Kerman and Bandar Abbas: reports'

physicalDescription.extent: The papers are arranged in approximate chronological order from the rear to the front of the file.

Foliation: the foliation sequence (used for referencing) commences at the front cover with 1, and terminates at the inside back cover with 12; these numbers are written in pencil, are circled, and are located in the top right corner of the recto side of each folio.

mods.abstract: The file contains reports on the conditions of life at the consular posts at Kerman and Bandar Abbas, sent to the Foreign Office by the British Consulate at Kerman and Bandar Abbas.
